inn1.comm: gets on the front foot and defends a flighted one
tossed up again, pushed to mid off
flatter now, he gets forward to block
width outside off now, but Wade's cut finds point
drives a tossed up delivery, to mid off
another drive, this time to point, and Dilshan begins with six dots
thick inside edge first ball, Warner's attempted drive through the off side scooting behind square on the leg
good length around off, blocked off the front foot
worked wide of midwicket for two
drives an away moving delivery past cover, the throw from the deep misses at the non-striker's end, fortunately so, for Warner
defended to the off side
good length ball blocked off the front foot
full delivery, inside edged to the infield
defended back to the bowler
cut away, but a diving stop at point saves runs
defends a tossed up ball
blocked off the front foot
another drive finds a fielder, this time at extra cover, and Dilshan has started with successive maidens
Wade gets going, pitched up from Kula, but leg sidish, and he swipes it over midwicket
good length this time, tight line, around middle, he gets across and blocks
on the pads once again, this time it is a slower one, good length, nudged square
back of a length, and enough time to work it through midwicket
mistimes it as he tries to force it down the ground
flat, and Wade is quick to put it away, took a couple of steps out initially, Dilshan shortened, and Wade stopped, allowed it to come on and guided it through point
tries the same ploy, but the ball is not as short this time, and he pushes it to off
on the pads, and Wade nudges it softly to the fine leg rope
punched from the crease to extra cover
tossed up now, fullish, played back to Dilshan
he had a look, was preparing to go after it, it was the slower one, fullish, and once he realised that, he just ran it towards point
played out to point with an open face
Kula has been drifting onto the pads often, pitched up on leg stump, Warner clips it through wide mid on
again on the pads, good length, worked to deep square
short of a length, and he goes for the pull, but it is also bowled slow, at 117 kph, and the ball is mistimed enough to roll tamely to mid on
nothing mistimed this time, he charges out and heaves this pitched up delivery straight back down the pitch to send all at the opposite end scrambling for cover, particularly the umpire
Warner now, lunges forward, opens the face and lofts with the turn over extra cover
flat this time, but some width, and Warner goes after it, needs a diving stop at cover
tossed up, draws him out, but he cannot beat extra cover
Dilshan is being mobbed by his team-mates, lovely delivery, angled in on a good length from round the stumps, pitches off, and straightens sharply to beat Warner's push and hit the stump
full, outside off stump, defended back down the pitch
fuller, pushed to mid on, and the batsmen scamper a single
length ball on middle stump, Hughes defends back to the bowler
fuller and moving across Hughes, the batsman defends it to the on side
defended again as Kulasekara continues to move it a touch across Hughes
bit shorter, and Hughes cuts close to his body, and gets a single down to long leg
pitched outside leg stump, Wade works that fullish ball into the on side
Fullish and on the legs again, Hughes pushes to mid on for a single
full, on off stump, defended into the off side
length ball on off, defended
a bit straighter and shorter, Hughes watchfully defends
length on off stump, Hughes gets forward again
a tad shorter, no change in approach from Hughes
and another dot ball finishes the maiden, the third from Dilshan. Bit straighter this time and Hughes defends again
length on the pads, defended into the on side
123kph, length ball on the pads, appeal for lbw, but it pitched outside leg I expect
full and on off stump, Wade attempts to drive that but doesn't time it. Tidied up by short cover.
shorter and angled across, Wade stands up to punch that through the off side, and a fumble at cover point allows a single
on the legs and Hughes knocks that into the leg side and the batsmen take one into the infield

OUT! Second breakthrough for Sri Lanka, and no, this one isn't the outswinger to the left handers. Kulasekara pitches it on leg and gets it to straighten, which is what does Wade in. the batsman had expected that to go with the angle and played a delicate cut shot, but the ball struck him in front and the review could not save him.
length ball, pushed for a single
full delivery, Bailey hits that to long on
length ball, defended square into the on side
pushed wide of mid on and the batsmen take one
worked off the legs into a gap, square on the leg side
Hughes gets forward and pushes a fullish ball to short cover
length wide off off stump, Bailey punches that straight to point
full ball well wide of off stump again, Bailey defends to the off side
full and angled in towards the stumps, driven to mid on
angled in again, and Bailey defends this to the off side
length outside off stump, Bailey leaves that alone
angled in again, Bailey punches that one, but straight to the cover fielder, and Kulasekara gets in on a maiden
Full ball on the stumps, pushed square of mid on, Malinga chases after it, stops it with his boot, but allows two
full outside off stump, driven with intent by Hughes, but short cover gets a hand on it and keeps it to one
pitched on middle and straightens, Bailey gets a thick outside edge into the infield
shuffles down the pitch and punches that to long off
length outside off stump, pushed into the off side, but straight to a fielder
length outside off again, this time Hughes finds a gap with his push
Length ball outside off stump, a touch of movement, and that goes through to the keeper
tighter on the stumps and fuller, Hughes defends that into the off side
very wide length ball, Hughes moves across to cut it but doesn't time it as he would like. Dilshan misfields though and allows a single
length ball outside off stump, defended
big shout for lbw! it's hit Bailey on the knee roll and it may have been moving down the leg side as well. The appeal is turned down and Sri Lanka opt not to review,
length on the stumps, defended to the leg side
130kph, length on off stump, Hughes shaped to hit that through the on side, but ends up defending it
on off stump again, pushed into the square on the off side
full and outside off, Hughes drives it straight to mid off
short, well outside off stump, Hughes plays that late and he gets it fine enough of third man to take two runs
length ball angled across him, hit to short cover
length outside off again, punched to cover
length outside off, pushed into the off side
full and on the pads, Bailey picks that up languidly and gets it over midwicket and to the fence, lovely shot.
length ball outside off again, and pushed into the off side
another appeal. This one for a caught behind, it was close to the inside edge, but there doesn't seem to be much in it. Could have been an lbw shout as well, but it hit the batsman outside off stump
pushed wide of mid on, and the batsmen scamper one
length ball outside off stump, Hughes opens the face and runs it to third man
short of a length  ball outside off, defended on the back foot
fuller and on off stump, pushed into the infield defensively
length on off stump again, Hughes pushes at it and the batsmen consider a run, but decide against it
length ball on middle stump, knocked down into the leg side
length wide of off stump, Hughes goes back and punches this through the gap on the off side to the deep cover fielder
142kph, fast, tailing yorker. Bailey just got his bat down in time on that one, as it honed in on leg stump. A yelp from Malinga.
length wide of off stump, Hughes punches that with intent, but Dilshan fields it at backward point
length ball again, Hughes comes forward to push it to extra cover
pierces the field, and this runs to the cover fence. Fullish ball outside off, and Hughes comes forward and times it sweetly
pushed into the leg side, and the batsmen take a quick single
driven straight, but the ball hits the stumps at the other end and deflects straight to mid on
length ball, angled slightly in to Bailey, He opens the face and hits that behind square for one
full and tailing again, pushed to mid on
Malinga's got his yorkers humming now, this one was right in the block hole and swinging towards leg stump. Assured defence from Bailey though.
length on off stump. Bailey defends that back to the bowler. Malinga's operating at around 140kph.
slower ball outside off stump, pushed to point
another tailing full delivery, hits the inside of Bailey's bat and goes to mid on
full, fast and tailing again. Bailey drives at it but can't get any power in the shot. Mid off fields and Malinga has his first maiden.
flighted and pitched outside off stump, Hughes strides forward in defence
flighted again, Hughes shuffles up and kills the spin
a smidge shorter here, and Hughes hangs back. It beats his outside edge
fullish, pushed into the leg side
full again, Hughes comes forward and pushes it back to Herath
Herath has landed it almost on the same spot as his five previous balls. Pushed defensively into the off side
a wide floater outside the off stump, Bailey drives that wide of the cover sweeper, who runs around and keeps it to two
short outside off stump, Bailey plays a controlled pull to deep square leg
It's hit the stumps! But the bails didn't come off. Short again, and Hughes attempts a pull. The ball gets an under edge, dribbles onto the stumps, but not with enough force to dislodge the bails.
slower ball on leg stump, Hughes whips that off his pads and fine leg can't prevent two
lovely shot! Full and outside off stump, Hughes drives that past a diving mid off to the boundary
shortish, pulled well in front of square to the sweeper on the leg side
full and on leg stump, worked into the leg side, where a misfield allows a second run
shorter and outside off stump, cut straight to point
full and on the legs, Hughes whips that to square leg
shuffles down the pitch and hits that back to the bowler
floated right up there, Hughes whips it square on the leg side again, not fooled by the flight
full, pitched on middle and straightening. Bailey defends.
wide and short, Hughes cuts that hard, but straight to the deep fielder on the off side
wide again, and full, Bailey drives away from his body and again the deep square fielder keeps it to one
poor bowling from Perera, he's been all over the place so far. This one is way down leg side, Hughes gets some bat on it and it's down to the fine leg fence for a simple four
another wide one down the leg side, and even Chandimal can't stop this one. He gets a glove on it which prevents it from running to the boundary
better from Perera, length ball outside off stump that's defended
full and outside off stump, Bailey beats the diving cover with a drive and a poor throw from Malinga means the batsman take two easily
length outside off stump,  the drive is stopped by cover this time
length ball, pitched on middle but angled across, defended
fuller, pitched on off stump, Hughes opens the face and gets a single to point
full and on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Bailey is down the pitch and drives that to long off. the batsmen think about two but decide against it
a full ball is worked off the toes into the leg side
full again, and driven - but straight to short cover
full and on off stump, driven straight to the fielder
pitched on middle, length ball. Hughes comes forward and defends
super shot. Full from Perera, Hughes throws his hands at that one and times it superbly wide of mid off, all the way to the fence
short of a length and Hughes attempts to cut that, but it's too close to his body
length ball on middle stump, hit back to the bowler
length ball angled across Hughes, the batsman tries to punch that into the off side but doesn't time it
full and on off stump, driven to the fielder
full, but slightly on the pads and Bailey knocks that down to long on for one
full again, outside off stump, Hughes punches that to deep cover and thinks about the second, but opts out
pitched on middle stump, Bailey defends
flighted and pitched wide of off stump, Bailey jams it into the pitch
the batsman advances, but Herath pulls his length back a touch and Bailey can only defend that one back to Herath
Length on off stump, defended into the off side
length on middle stump, watchfully played again
pushed into the off side for one

would you believe it? Perera has conjured a wicket out of nowhere. Fullish ball, seemed to hang in the pitch for a moment and Bailey was too quick on the shot. He ends up lobbing that straight back to the bowler, who takes a decent catch, bending low on his follow through.
Length ball, outside off stump. Hussey flashes a cut but doesn't get anything on it
135kph, Full and outside off. Driven by Hussey, but straight to the short cover.
drifted way wide of off stump, Hughes steps out and defends
he goes back, and cuts this one, but straight to the fielder
full and on his legs, pushed to mid on
full and on leg stump again, Hughes turns that to square leg but can't beat the fielder
this one slides across Hughes and beats his outside edge. Chandimal lets out a little yelp. He's kept well today
full and on the legs again, Hughes can't pierce the legside ring
tailing full ball, but it's overpitched and Hussey swings that on to the leg side for three. Just a touch too short from Malinga
this time he gets the yorker right, Hughes just gets his bat down in time. The ball was heading towards leg stump
full ball angled across Hughes, the batsman drives but gets a thick outside edge which goes safely to third man
full tailing yorker at 141kph. Hussey blocks that into the off side.
fullish again, Hussey gets that through the off side infield for a single
Another yorker, Hughes' bat comes down a little early and he gets a leading edge, but the ball scoots along the ground to third man.
full and on off stump, Hughes punches it to long on
length ball on the pads, Hussey goes back to whip that to the deep fielder on the leg side
fullish, punched to sweeper cover this time
Hughes comes down the pitch and drives that nicely past cover for four. Great shot and it seems like he is sick of being bowled to. That's his 50 as well.
full delivery, hit to mid off
slightly shorter and turned into the leg side, but to the fielder
Short ball, Hussey climbs nicely on top of that one and pulls it into the deep
fullish ball, driven to mid off
full toss, searching for the yorker, and Hughes drives that to mid on again. Australia are looking to keep the score moving quickly here.
full and outside off stump, Hughes drives that past cover and the sweeper comes around to cut it off in the deep
another leading edge off a yorker, but Hughes didn't get enough bat on it for the ball to carry to the fielder.
slower ball, length on leg stump, Hughes whips that around to the deep square leg.
Full and on off stump, defended back down the pitch
a tad shorter and straightening, Hughes defends again
Hughes had no idea about that one. Shuffles down the pitch a little, but Herath fires it full and fast and Hughes manages to get his bat down and gets an outside edge past the keeper
full and on the legs, hit to short midwicket
comes down the pitch and whips it to midwicket again. Herath is all over him, but Hughes isn't about to give it away.
a little shuffle down the pitch again, and Hughes defends this one to the off side as Herath pares back the length a shade
length and outside off stump, Hussey slots that softly to the offside and the batsmen scamper a second
fullish and on leg stump, hit wide of mid on and the batsmen take another quick run
wide and full, driven hard into the off side and the sweeper runs around to cut it off
wide of off stump, Hughes goes back and cuts well, but Dilshan makes a diving save at backward point
wide of off sump again, Hughes cuts in front of square this time and hits a gap
length outside off, punched into the square on the off side
length ball, whipped into the leg side for a single
Full and outside off, driven into the vacant off side
full and wide, Hughes advances and jams down on that one. Gets it wide of backward point to take one
punched down the ground, and Herath can't stop that
great shot! Shuffles down again and gets to the pitch of the ball, throws his hands at it and beats sweeper cover, having timed it nicely
pushed into the offside for one. These two have done a good job of injecting a little life into the run rate.
wide and short, but Hughes finds a diving Dilshan with his cut
length outside off stump, that's been hit into the deep on the off side
length on the legs, turned into the legside where the deep fielder runs around to collect
Hughes waits on a wide-ish delivery outside off stump and gets it fine of a diving Dilshan for one
length outside off stump, defended
full on middle stump and that's been driven powerfully down the ground. Perera can't get a hand on it and it zooms to the straight fence with two men giving chase.
Fullish and on off stump, Hughes hits back to the bowler
down the track and Hughes whips that to the leg side
pitched on middle stump and straightening slightly, Hussey hits that to long on
pushed into the off side, where it's fielded well to prevent a second run
fullish again, and driven unfussily down to long off
big lbw appeal as Herath gets one to turn into Hughes from off stump, but it's turned down quickly. That was probably missing leg.
full and tailing, Hussey gets that wide of mid on and scampers a quick single. A shy at the stumps, but Hussey would have been home anyway.
poor ball, don't bowl there to Hughes. Wide and short, Hughes murders that through Dilshan at  backward point and to the fence
tailing yorker, dug out watchfully
full toss outside off stump, Hughes drives that straight to deep cover
full and just outside off, driven down the ground
Hughes backs away to make room, but Malinga follows him with an attempted yorker. The batsman manages to get it away into the off side for one though.
full ball, driven straight back but Herath misfields it
full and pitched on middle stump, hit straight back to Herath
a tad shorter this time and outside off stump, Hussey hits back to the bowler again
in the blockhole, and Hussey just digs that one out
pitched on middle stump and Hussey manages to get that one past Herath and to long on.
pitched on middle stump again and turned just wide of mid on  for a quick single.
poor full toss outside off stump from Malinga and Hughes smacks that past point for a boundary
terrific shot. This was an attempted yorker on leg stump and Hughes opens his stance and whips that powerfully wide of mid on for a boundary
this one is worked into the leg side off the pads, and the batsmen scamper one
wide yorker, Hussey drives at that one. Doesn't time it, but gets it wide enough of mid on to get a single.
wide and full again, Hughes gets low and runs it off the blade for one
attempted yorker fired down the leg side. Chandimal does well to collect.
another attempted yorker that's a tad too short. Hussey works that into the legside infield.
length on off stump, driven straight to cover
slower ball wide of off stump and a touch short. Huseey goes back to cut that into the square, and there is enough time to take one
full and on the pads, Hughes whips that to the deep legside fielder
full toss outside off, Hughes runs down the pitch but can't get bat on it. Hughes is annoyed with himself for missing that, with the field up
length ball angled in. Hughes works that wide of mid on
slower ball on the stumps, punched to sweeper cover
Short of a length on the stumps, hit into the leg side, but to the midwicket fielder
fuller and on the stumps, hit slightly wide of Malinga at midwicket this time, and a single is taken
slower ball just short of a length. Hughes pushes that into the offside.
Hughes swipes across the line there, pulling the ball from way outside off stump to the deep midwicket fielder
length ball on the stumps, pushed into the leg side for one
fullish and on off stump, pushed to long on for a single
delivered from wide of the crease, angled in. Hughes gets an inside edge on that
full and on the stumps, Hughes comes down the track and squeezes it into the gap on the off side and to deep cover
full toss on middle stump, Hussey whips that to deep midwicket
slower ball, 102kph, Hughes advances and has a swing at at that. Gets it to go to deep midwicket off a mishit.
full and on the toes, Hussey drives to long on for one

very short there, might have been a wide if Hughes left it alone. He gets his bat above his head and manages to control the shot down to fine leg. Five away from a hundred here, and he has increased his strike rate nicely.
fullish ball, hit straight to midwicket. Hughes scampers one, and may have been in trouble had the throw hit from Thirimanne.
outside off stump, goes through to the keeper
slower ball outside off stump, Hussey cuts it but can't beat Dilshan who dives to make the stop
angled into the pads, Hussey turns that towards deep square leg and the batsmen scamper two. Good running.
wide of off stump again, but Hussey bunts that down towards mid on for one. Picking the gaps nicely here
length ball on the pads, Hughes whips that straight to the deep midwicket
Hundred for Hughes! Short and wide from Perera, and that is cut hard by Hughes. He gets that through the backward point fielder, and to the fence. Good hundred and his second in the series.
length on the pads, hit into the legside, but can't beat the fielder
fullish and on off stump, scooped over the infield on the offside
Hughes hits that hard into the legside this time, and there's enough time for a well-run two
makes room and drives that hard, but Jeevan Mendis at mid on makes a superb diving save. Can't prevent the single though

Perera has conjured another wicket - a run out this time. Hussey hit that straight into the pitch and took off for a run that simply wasn't there, because the ball had only made it as far as the bowler. Hussey turned to return to his crease, but Perera was on target with the throw and Hussey was miles out. Decent knock there from Hussey. The end of a very good partnership.
Slower ball first up. It's fullish and outside off stump. The batsman swings big, but can't get bat to it.
another slower ball outside off stump and Hughes is through the shot early again.
another slower ball angled across, but Hughes is wise to it this time. Strokes that to the sweeper cover and puts Maxwell on strike
attempted yorker that is again a little short. Maxwell clears the front leg and drills that to deep cover.

slower short ball, and Maxwell gets away with a baseball-style bunt. He was shaping to pull that but realised it was too slow, and just hung the bat out. The ball took a top edge and landed safely in the infield

yet another slower ball and another one that almost yields a wicket. Hughes clears the front leg and tries to smash that through the offside, but is fooled by the lack of pace again. The mishit lands just short of cover
big six first up. Hughes opens his stance and swings that overpitched delivery way over cow corner
hits that one square on the offside

dropped! Tough chance though. Slower length ball outside off stump and Maxwell swings hard at that. Mahela at mid on gets fingertips to it as he attempts to pull the ball down, but he can't hold the catch. Saves a boundary though.
full and straight, driven down the ground
full again, hit towards long on for one
full and on the stumps, hit to extra cover for one
full toss on the stumps, Maxwell makes room and he smashes that through the packed offside right field to the boundary. Australia out to hurt Sri Lanka here.
advances and makes room, but it's a slower ball outside off stump and he's through the shot way too early
slower short ball, and he's through the shot early again. Hits him on the side and the batsmen take a leg bye
slower ball again, fuller this time. Hughes carves that to deep point.
slower again, short outside off stump and Hughes drags that onto the leg side, but straight to the fielder at a straight-ish midwicket

another slower ball, an full. Maxwell trying to smash that over the top, but he's undone by the lack of pace again, and this time the top edge sails high enough for a fielder to settle under it at extra cover.
wide and short, Henriques hits that into the deep on the offside and turns the strike over
Hughes makes room and hits a length ball on the stumps wide of deep cover for a couple
a slower ball again but Hughes is reading them well now. Length and on the stumps, and Hughes swings that onto the leg side. Goes flat and fast and almost over the fence.
beautifully played. Full and outside off, Hughes just gets low and directs that fine of short third man for four. He's playing a gem here.
short ball, and I think that was the slower one, Hughes can't get bat on it and it hits him. The batsmen take a leg bye
fullish ball, hit to mid off
slower ball again and Henriques just knocks that into the off side and gets Hughes on strike
Short of a length outisde off stump, punched to deep cover
slow and on the stumps again, turned into the on side for one.
slow again, Hughes tries to cut it but gets and under edge. The batsmen scamper a single and there's a chance of an overthrow, but Hughes can't turn in time.
139kph, full and hit straight to the backward point fielder
slower again, and full outside off. Henriques gets a top edge, but it lands well short of third man
full toss on the stumps, drilled wide of long on, and the batsmen take two
full and on the stumps again, hit to long off, but to the fielder this time.
length ball, and a charging Hughes can only get that as far as the bowler. Retreats quickly to the crease.
full toss angled in, Hughes stays deep in his crease and swings that over midwicket and to the legside fence.
very well timed straight drive there to an overpitched delivery on the stumps. Thisara Perera runs around to cut it off just short of the boundary.
full again and drilled hard to sweeper cover. Just a single off the last ball.

inn2.comm: length ball outside off stump, lovely shape away, Mahela leaves it alone
on the pads, back of a length, Mahela turns that into the legside, thinks about a run and reconsiders
leans on a languid straight drive off an overpitched delivery on the stumps, not hit hard enough to get a boundary, but the batsmen run two
length outside off stump, Mahela is nicely behind it
full again, and straight driven. This time mid off is straighter, and Mahela can't beat the fielder
length ball angled into the stumps, pushed into the leg side
wild start there, Starc coming in from over the wicket lets one go way wide of Dilshan's off stump. That was heading to first slip
angled across again, tighter into the stumps this time. dilshan leaves it alone
fuller and closer to the stumps again, driven into the infield and the batsmen take one
shorter and outside off stump, punched to the point fielder
lovely timing from Mahela, Overpitched from Starc and the batsmen hits that over short mid on, and that's Sri Lanka's first boundary
full and wide of off stump, tries to jam that into the off side but misses
steps forward and pushes that length delivery gently to the offside
full and on the stumps, Dilshan defends back to the bowler
full and straying slightly onto the pads this time. Dilshan clips it square on the leg side
length ball angled in, defended into the off side
full and straight again, and Jayawardene works that to the leg side
again McKay bowls on the pads and Dilshan gets it square on the on side again.
fullish and outside off, Mahela is forward to defend
back of a length and into the body, Dilshan knocks that into the leg side and takes off, but is turned back quickly by his partner
fullish and swinging in, the ball hits Dilshan on the pad and sparks a big appeal, but it seemed to be going down leg. Seems to have been an inside edge as well.
short of a length on off stump, Dilshan punches that into the square
short and on the leg side, Dilshan gets glove one it and takes two as the ball rolls past the keeper
on the legs again and seaming in to Dilshan a tad. He tries to whip that away to the leg side, but can't get bat on it
fullish again and on the stumps, Dilshan gets a thick inside edge and is interested in taking a run, but Mahela isn't
wide and a little bit short. Mahela cuts that nicely but can't beat David Warner at backward point. Dilshan is sent back again.
angled well into the body and back of a length. Tucked into the leg side, but not well enough to beat the fielder
too far down leg side this time. back of a length again. That collects Mahela's inside edge and the thigh pad and rolls to the fine leg fence
runs down the pitch, but can't do much with the length ball that McKay has bowled
nicely picked up there. McKay was full and straight, Jayawardene steps across and lifts that over midwicket for four
and that's the best shot so far. Not a lot wrong with the ball - it was length outside off stump. Mahela leans into a cover drive and places it well enough to thread the field. Great timing.
leg side again, and Dilshan glances it down to fine leg
this one is length on off stump and Dilshan hits that to cover
back to the leg-stump line. Dilshan works the full ball off his legs into the deep
and a super stroke again. Lovely batting here, but poor bowling as well. Starc floats one up well wide of off stump and Mahela gets down to square drive that past a diving Warner
yorker in the blockhole, Mahela makes room, but can't get it past cover
length outside off stump, run down to third man for one
Angles a length-ball into Dilshan, who defends it to the off side
length and on the pads, Mahela tucks that into the leg side
full and on the stumps, dug out wide of mid on and Dilshan scampers a single
back of a length, tucked into the on side again
length outside off stump, pushed to point
back of a length and outside off, Dilshan defends to short cover
back of a length and angled in again, Dilshan is watchful in defence
wide of off stump, run off the open blade to third man
short and angled across, Dilshan tries to pull but misses
length and on the stumps, Dilshan hits this back with a straight bat
back of a length, on the legs. Dilshan turns it to the leg side, but finds midwicket
there's that booming drive. Johnson floats it up, and Dilshan winds up and lets fly, but can only manage an inside edge. Shades of his MCG dismissal in the first innings,
length ball angled across, defended back to the bowler
fullish and angled in to off stump, turned into a gap on the leg side
short of a length on off stump, cut into the square and it's wide enough of the fielder to get a run
angled too far down the leg side.
length outside off stump, defended into the off side
not far from the short fine leg fielder, but safe enough. McKay strays on the legs again and Mahela clips that aerially behind square for four
fullish, outside off stump. Mahela drives but can't beat mid on
full, straight and driven again, but not well enough to yield a run
short of a length on off stump, Dilshan thrashes at that one, but doesn't time it
just a little wide of off stump and short, Dilshan cuts that into the square the batsmen scamper one
back of a length, not much width, but Mahela plays that late and gets it square of fine leg for two. Timing it beautifully at the moment.
129kph, full and on the stumps. Pushed into a leg side gap for one.
full and on off stump, Dilshan drives and times it well, but it's straight to Hughes at short cover
length ball wide of off stump, Dilshan carves that behind point and long leg runs around to keep it to one
full toss to start, but Dilshan can't put it away, hitting it to mid wicket
full and on the legs, Dilshan gets it down the ground
on leg stump and full again, turned backward of square
full, on off stump, driven to long off
shorter and wide of off stump, Mahela goes back to cut, but hits it to backward point
length ball outside off stump, Mahela gets the forward press working and strokes it to deep cover
fullish and on the stumps, clipped to short midwicket
full and on the stumps again, Mahela straight drives, but Mitch gets a hand to it
full and outside off stump, driven to deep cover.
length ball on the stumps, worked square on the leg side
short of a length and on the stumps, defended on the back foot
length ball on off stump, defended straight

that was somewhat out of the blue. Seems to have stuck in the pitch more than Mahela expected. He was aiming a shot through mid off, but gets an inside edge and it lobs to mid on, who takes a simple catch. Doherty delivers the breakthrough Australia needed.
full and on off stump, driven, but to short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, defended
length again, straying onto the pads, worked into the leg side
pitches outside off and straightens, Dilshan defends
a little straighter this time, Dilshan knocks that into the off side and they scamper a single
length ball on Dilshan's pads, the batsman take a leg bye
short ball, 138kph, and the pitch is keeping low. Thirimanne ducks under it, but the ball bounces well short of the keeper.
length ball on the stumps, turned to square leg
fired down leg side, Thirimanne can't get a touch on it
length on off stump, the batsman is forward in defence
length outside off stump, nicely behind it again
fuller this time, and outside off stump, but defended
on leg stump again, and that collects a pad on its way past Matthew Wade
length on off stump, and that's defended

poor option from Thirimanne, and Sri Lanka are throwing away a decent start. He came down the pitch and tried to loft that over midwicket, only he hit it too straight and David Hussey at long on ran around to swallow it. It was the result of some good pressure, but he will feel that that shot wasn't called for, so early in his innings
fired into off stump, hit to mid off
fullish outside off stump, Dilshan hits that back towards Doherty
fullish and on off stump, and pushed back at the bowler
full and on the stumps, Chandimal gets behind it
fullish and on the pads, Chandimal turns that backward of square
full and outside off stump, Dilshan pushes that into the infield
full and on off stump, driven to deep cover
length ball outside off stump and that's nicely dabbed by Chanidmal, plays it really late and runs it down to the third man fence
134kph, length ball, defended
full and pitched outside off, driven to long off
fulish on off stump, poked away to the off side
full and on off stump, driven straight to short cover
very full again, and Chandimal hits the short cover fielder once more
again, Chandimal drives a full ball, but finds the fielder
he defends this time, and this is getting a little repetitive for short cover, who collects
length outside off, run down to third man off the open blad
tighter into the stumps, defended to point

Henriques strikes! Dislhan edges an innocuous delivery behind, and leaves Sri Lanka in trouble. He hasn't looked himself at all in this innings and has taken 48 balls for 19. Pressure on the young middle order now, and Australia will feel they are on top now, the way the pitch is playing.
back of a length and at the body, turned into the leg side to get off the mark
fullish on off stump, pushed into the off side
full and on off stump, driven to short cover
full and on leg stump, tapped away to the leg side
Chandimal advances and blocks that one to short cover
same ball, and same stroke. Chandimal down the pitch and defends again
down the track again, can't get it past short cover this time either
sits back this time, and it's thrown up slightly wider. Chandimal cuts that into the deep
Mathews stays in his crease and punches a length ball on off stump to deep cover
full and on off stump, hit straight back to the bowler
length ball on off stumps, Mathews tries to work that to the leg side on the back foot, but hits it too straight
length on off stump, defended by Mathews
fuller delivery, hit back to the bowler again who deflects the ball onto the stumps at the non-striker's Chandimal was home though
Mathews comes down the pitch and tries to hit a back-of-a-length ball through cover, but gets an inside edge and they take a single
that stayed low as well. Chandimal tried to pull that but it took an under edge back onto his pads
shortish ball, hit to deep cover for a single
Chandimal comes down the pitch and drives, but finds Doherty
shuffles down the pitch again and defends

timber! Chandimal had no idea about that one. Pitched on off stump and straightened, and the batsman was nowhere near it. Went on to hit middle and off. The situation is quickly getting dire for the visitors.
length ball pitched on leg stump, knocked into the on side
pitches on off and straightens, Perera defends
fullish wide of off stump, driven to mid on
length ball outside off stump, defended into the off side
length on off stump, Mathews hangs back and gets that square on the leg side
Full toss on the stumps, nicely struck by Perera, but it's stopped brilliantly at short midwicket
length on off stump, Perera comes forward to defend
length ball wide of off stump, but it keeps very low, and sneaks below Perera's cut shot. Batting becoming very difficult here.
fullish, defended into the off side
full ball, driven to long off
length on leg stump, hit straight to short fine leg
leg stump line again and straightening, but hit to midwicket which allows a run
pitching outside off stump and straightening, Mathews is forward in defence
Mathews comes forward to defend again, and Wade lets out a long, lone appeal. Umpire not interested. I think that hit bat first, before striking pad
full and outside off stump, Perera drives and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
full and angled pitched on middle stump, Mathews defends
full and on the stumps again, defended into the off side
Angled into Mathews, who defends again
turns a length ball into the leg side, and the batsman scamper a tight two as Doherty steams in from fine leg
full, almost a yorker. Mathews digs it out.
Perera down the pitch and digs it out to mid on.
fullish again, this time Perera stays back and works it into the leg side off his pads
fullish on off stump, Mathews hits it to mid on
full again, this time Mathews drives and a misfield at short cover allows a single
goes back and cuts a wide delivery, but straight to the fielder
length ball, pushed into the off side
works that off his legs to deep midwicket
another fine cut shot from Perera off a short, wide ball but he can't find the gap
lovely delivery from Starc. A tiny bit of late swing means the full delivery just outside off stump beats the batsman's inside edge.
swing into the batsman again, and Perera's cover drive is inside edged onto his pads
angled in to just outside off stump, Perera is nicely behind a length ball
angled in again and full. Perera pushes that to mid on. Just one run off that over. Pressure building big here for Sri Lanka.
forward to defend that fullish delivery into the off side
Mathews runs down the track and lofts that one past the bowler towards the straight fence
goes back to cut, but finds the fielder
hit into the off side, straight to the fielder
works that length ball off his pads behind square
Perera gets a short ball, and he pulls it into the deep, but to the fielder
angled down the leg side and that is glanced to fine leg for a single
wide of off stump from around the wicket. Mathews goes for a big drive but doesn't make contact with the full delivery.
144kph, and banged in short. Mathews tries to pull it but it goes under his bat again. This pitch is really dying.
angled into the off stump and Mathews gets behind that.
full and outside off, jammed down to third man for a run
length ball outside off stump, defended by Perera. Another good over for Australia.
length on the stumps, Mathews comes down the track and checks his shot when the length isn't there for him
length outside off stump, pushed to long on for a single
that is a wild swipe but it gets Sri Lanka's fist boundary in a long time. Length ball again and Perera fetches that from outside off stump and sends it to the cow corner fence.
length outside off stump, defended
wide of off stump, hit to deep cover for one
length on middle stump, Mathews knocks that to the leg side for one
hits Mathews on the pads with a length ball and the batsman take a leg bye
length ball outside off stump, hit to point
swings across the line again, and gets a big inside edge to fine leg
128kph, short ball, Mathews tried to pull that but was through the shot early and it hits him on the forearm
140kph short ball this time, Mathews gets bat on it and controls the pull shot to deep midwicket
length on the legs and whipped away to long leg for one
Full and outside off stump, Perera gets a thick edge to third man
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
length ball on middle stump, stroked down to long on
short, but not all that wide. Cut nicely nonetheless, but the fielder in the deep keeps it to one.
full and on off stump, Mathews mines that long on gap for one more
length outside off stump, Perera drives it to the deep

gone! Johnson gets one to bounce a little more than they have and Perera gets a big top edge as he tries to work that into the leg side. David Warner at mid wicket waits for an eternity for it to come down, and takes the catch comfortably. Another big blow and Sri Lanka are sliding quickly here.
angled into the pads and glanced away to fine leg
short ball, Mathews gets on top of that and gets it down to fine leg comfortably
length outside off stump, Mendis is forward to defend
length outside off stump again, and Mendis defends back to the bowler
length ball on the wickets, Mendis turns that to the leg side and takes off, but is sent back by Mathews as Warner fields
Length ball outside off stump, pushed into the off side
length ball again, Mathews finds that gap to get a single to long on
back of a length, Mendis shuffles across his stumps and defends
angled into the batsman, and Mendis is cramped for space. Defends into the off side.
slower delivery, pushed to the off side again
length ball outside off stump, punched to deep cover
angled into the pads, fullish delivery, turned into the leg side
full delivery outside off stump, dug out to mid off by Mathews
full on the stumps, Mathews whips that powerfully, but finds mid on
wide and angled across at 143kph, Mathews aims a cut short at that one but can't connect
length angled across the batsman, Mathews defends on the front foot
full and on the legs, Mathews tries to clip that square, but misses and the ball strikes his pads. One run off that over.
slower ball outside off stump, Mendis pokes at it but misses
length ball angled in towards off stump, defended on the front foot
length ball again, Mendis tries to open the face but can't beat point
defends a length ball on off stump to the leg side
length outside off stump again and Mendis hits that to point
and Henriques completes a maiden. Mendis gets that length ball on middle stump and pushes it to short midwicket.
the bowler goes wide of the crease and angles it in, but over pitches and Mathews pounces. He opens up his stance and goes inside out over cover for four.
angled in again, only fuller. Mathews can't do much with that one. Jams it into the pitch
bouncer from Starc, and Mathews controls the hook shot to deep square leg
length outside off stump and Mendis comes forward to defend. Mathews needs him to play a few shots here.
shy at the stumps and he misses! Would have been out if he hit. Mendis turned a length ball to David Warner at mid on and his underarm throw just missed as the batsmen scampered one.
back of a length on off stump and defended into the leg side. Only six from that over despite the boundary.
Shortish outside off stump, Mendis tries to pull but gets and under edge onto his pads and the batsman take a quick one
slower ball, 110kph. Pitched it wide of off stump and Mathews defends that one.
another slower ball, on the stumps this time, Mathews knocks it onto the off side and takes one
another slower ball, but this one is short and Mendis swivels around and pulls that over backward square leg to the vacant boundary
back of a length delivery. Mendis shuffles forward but can only defend it.
a slower ball outside off stump, and Mendis tries to run that off the blade, but can't beat short third man. Six off the over again. Not good enough for the visitors by a long shot.
fires one down the leg side
good shot from Mathews. That was in the slot from Starc, overpitched and outside off stump. Mathews just hammers him over mid off for four
wide and full, Mathews opens the face and runs that to third man
length ball outside off stump, Mendis aims a swipe across the line but only gets an inside edge to midwicket
worked off the legs and Mendis gets down the other end
full and outside off, jammed into the pitch and the batsmen scamper one
short ball, Mendis ducks under it
slower ball outside off the stump, Mathews goes for a lavish drive, gets an outside edge and that beats Wade on its way to the fence
slower again, back of a length, tucked into the leg side
short ball, slower again, and Mendis gets inside the line, but can't make contact with his pull
tries to smash that away on the leg side but can't make decent contact. The batsman take a run after the ball dribbles onto the pitch
one the pads from McKay, worked to midwicket
Mendis aims an expansive drive, but the bounce is lower than he expects and it scoots to the keeper
slower length ball on the pads, Mathews can't get bat to that
shortish and on leg stump, Mathews pulls but can't beat square leg
Mendis finally gets hold of one. That was in the slot from Mitch and fast. Length outside off stump and that has been dispatched high over mid on.
fast bouncer, Mendis gets that on the splice and it goes in the air, but lands safely at around midwicket
slower short ball again from Mitch, Mathews gets onto that quickly and smashes it in front of square for four. Nicely hit.

length ball on the stumps, Mathews backs away but can't time his shot. Gets it as far as Warner in the covers who can't hit the stumps with an underarm throw again. Mathews might have been safe this time though.
Mathews blocks a length ball on off stump into the infield and takes a single
length ball angled in from around the wicket, Mendis swings that one to deep midwicket for a single
slower length ball from McKay and Mathews murders that over midwicket for four. That's his fifty up too.
full ball hit hard back at McKay, who can only get a hand to it. The deflection allows a couple.
length outside off stump, Mathews moves across the stumps and runs that to short third man.
slower ball again and it jumps off the surface a bit. Hits Mendis on the gloves and the batsmen scamper through

big appeal and a review! That was full and angled into leg stump and originally given runs, but the review shows that that only struck the boot. It was missing leg stump though, so no harm done for Sri Lanka. The batsmen have taken three to fine leg.
oho! Lovely shot from Mathews. In the slot from Mitch again, and Mathews swings that high over midwicket for four.
cut from close to the body, and Maxwell dives at point to save a run.
yorker is squiurted backward of square on the off side by Mendis. Mathews back on strike.
short ball on off stump and Mathews can't time his pull. It goes straight to midwicket.
don't worry about the timing on that one. Mathews waits on the back foot for another short one, and mows that over wide mid on for four. Super shot.
tossed wide of off stump, Mendis backed away and was nowhere near hitting that one.
a huge slog sweep aimed by Mendis there, but can't hit it properly.
another attempted sweep and another miss, as Doherty throws it up outside off stump
a bit shorter from Doherty, Mendis turns it around the corner for one
another nicely flighted ball, Mathews pushes that into the off side for a single
and theres the release! Doherty had done so well so far in the over, but Mendis gets one back. Runs down the pitch and strikes it high and long into the sightscreen.
123kph, length on middle stump, Mathews tries to smash that over mid on, but gets an inside edge onto his pads.
length ball angled in from around the stump, Mendis whips that to deep midwicket for a single
Mathews runs down the pitch and hits it aerially to cow corner, where there is a fielder now placed. The throw not collected though, and Sri Lanka get an overthrow.
a slog across the line again, but not timed. Just a single to midwicket
bowled him! Australia really needed that, Sri Lanka didn't. Mendis was on the charge, but Henriques went full and fast and hit the base of middle and leg. Moises is pumped.
In the blockhole and Perera can't do much with that. Great over Henriques.
Gone! And that could be it for Sri Lanka! Slower ball bouncer from Johnson and Mathews can't time that one. Lobs off the splice to midwicket, who completes an easy take.
slower ball outside off stump, strokes into the off side gap for a single
slower ball in the slot for Perera, and he swings that over the infield, just wide of long on for four.
length ball outside the off stump, sneaks under Perera's cut shot
wide of off stump again and Perera connects this time, as the sweeper runs around to cut it off
cut hard again, but straight to the sweeper on the off side, Perera retains the strike
and Perera goes! A fullish ball angled into the stumps and Perera plays all around that one, Crashes into middle stump again.
length ball on the pads, Herath gets bat to it and they scamper one
shortish ball outside off stump, Kulasekara clubs it down the ground
full and on the stumps, Herath opens the face and sends that to point
slower ball outside off stump, Kulasekara tries to go inside out but misses
slower short ball again, and Kulasekara sways out of the way, having misread the pace initially
Full and on the stumps, Herath hits that back over the bowler's head but doesn't quite time it
107kph, Kualsekara advances but cant time his shot. Goes straight back to the bowler
angled into the pads and Kulasekara misses again. Appeal from McKay, but the umpire's not interested.
slower ball again, angled into the stumps. Herath misses with his swing and the ball shaves the stumps
swipes across the line and gets a big top edge, which sails to Henriques at deep square leg, who runs in to take it comfortably
yet another slower ball, Kulasekara, again, can't connect with a cut shot
nasty short ball angled into Malinga, and it looks like it's hit him on the glove. They take a run, but the physio is out there immediately.
full and angled in, Kulasekara knocks it down to long on
angled into the blockhole. Malinga digs it out and the batsmen take one.
nicely flicked over short fine leg from Kulasekara, Picked up the short ball from leg stump and sent it high towards the boundary. The sweeper comes around to cut it off.
fullish delivery on off stump, carved powerfully over the off side infield for four. Good shot. He's been trying it for a while
Kulasekara moves back, but Starc goes wide of the off stump. Wide is called, but it seems harsh as that was inside the tram lines.
picked off his pads and timed well to the square leg fence. Another good shot, but coming too late for Sri Lanka, you feel
a slower ball outside off stump, Malinga can't get bat to it
slower ball again, bounces just over the stumps. Malinga's cross-bat swipe gets nowhere near it.
loses control of that one, down the leg side
slower again, and gone. Malinga pokes at that one and it lobs off the bat and into the hands of short third man, who takes a good low catch.
